StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRetrainCourses]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @RetrainID uniqueiden..er ) AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT [RetrainCourseID], [RetrainID], [CID], [ClassNumber], [DateReport], [DateClassBegin], [DateClassGradua.on] FROM [dbo].[RetrainCourse] WHERE [RetrainID] = @RetrainID
